sentences.english: Fantasy sports teams require constant attention and care.
sentences.chinese: 体坛梦之队需要不断的被关注与关怀。

sentences.english: Michael Phelps is leaving Beijing as a global sports icon.
sentences.chinese: 菲尔普斯将以体坛标志人物的形象告别北京。

sentences.english: Excitant is one of the important problem nowadays which the global sport pays close attention to generally.
sentences.chinese: 兴奋剂是当今国际体坛普遍关注的重要问题之一。

sentences.english: Coco Yee, One of the famous chinese sport reporter.
sentences.chinese: 易小荷，中国体坛著名记者之一。

sentences.english: Women also take part in all kind of sports played in today’s world.
sentences.chinese: 当今世界体坛的各种赛事都不乏女性的身影。

sentences.english: Yeah ,they are the prides of China.
sentences.chinese: 你觉得谁是中国体坛的骄傲？
